statements: DELETE FROM supplier_lead_times WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM delivery_delays WHERE delay_duration > 10 AND supplier_id = 2;

DELETE FROM DeliveryDelays WHERE cause = 'Weather conditions' AND delay_minutes > 30;
DELETE FROM SupplierLocations WHERE location_name = 'Warehouse A';
